sourcesContent:
export const productsData = [
  {
    id: 'hs-cit',
    name: 'HS-CIT',
    fullName: 'Haryana State Certificate in Information Technology',
    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/hs-cit.png',
    color: '#E8610A',
    tagline: 'Foundation of Digital Literacy for Every Student',
    desc: 'HS-CIT is a flagship digital literacy program that equips students with essential computer skills. Recognized by the Government of Haryana, it covers MS Office, Internet, email, and basic computer operations.',
    features: ['MS Office Suite', 'Internet & Email', 'Government Services Online', 'Basic Computer Skills', 'Haryana Govt Recognized'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Students Certified', value: '5L+' }, { label: 'Exam Centers', value: '2000+' }, { label: 'Years Running', value: '10+' }],
    image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/5380664/pexels-photo-5380664.jpeg',
  },
  {
    id: 'hs-cit-a',
    name: 'HS-CIT(A)',
    fullName: 'Haryana State Certificate in IT (Applications)',
    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/hs-cit-a.png',
    color: '#1565C0',
    tagline: 'Advanced Application Skills for the Digital World',
    desc: 'HS-CIT(A) takes digital literacy a step further by focusing on software applications. Students gain expertise in accounting software, data management, and digital communication tools used in industry.',
    features: ['Tally & Accounting Software', 'Database Management', 'Digital Communication', 'Presentation Tools', 'Industry-Ready Skills'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Students Enrolled', value: '2L+' }, { label: 'Partner Institutes', value: '800+' }, { label: 'Placement Rate', value: '78%' }],

  },
  {

    name: 'HS-CIT(A+)',
    fullName: 'Haryana State Certificate in IT (Advanced Applications)',
    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/hs-cit-a-plus.png',
    color: '#2E7D32',
    tagline: 'Elite IT Skills for Tomorrow\'s Professionals',
    desc: 'HS-CIT(A+) is the most advanced tier in the HS-CIT series, designed for students aiming for high-value IT careers. Covers programming fundamentals, web development, cybersecurity basics, and cloud computing.',
    features: ['Programming Basics', 'Web Development', 'Cybersecurity Awareness', 'Cloud Computing', 'AI & Data Fundamentals'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Advanced Learners', value: '50K+' }, { label: 'Industry Partners', value: '120+' }, { label: 'Avg Salary Hike', value: '35%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555949963-aa79dcee981c?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'career-oriented-courses',
    name: 'Career Oriented Courses',
    fullName: 'HKCL Career Oriented Courses',
    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/coc.png',
    color: '#E65100',
    tagline: 'Gateway to New Collar Jobs',
    desc: 'Specially designed job-ready courses aligned with industry demand. From digital marketing to graphic design, these courses help students bridge the gap between education and employment.',
    features: ['Digital Marketing', 'Graphic Design', 'Video Editing', 'E-Commerce Skills', 'Entrepreneurship Basics'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Active Courses', value: '25+' }, { label: 'Job Placements', value: '15K+' }, { label: 'Industry Partners', value: '200+' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522202176988-66273c2fd55f?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'bba-workplace',
    name: 'BBA@Workplace',
    fullName: 'Work-based BBA Degree by IGNOU & HKCL',
    category: 'Higher Education',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/bba.png',
    color: '#4527A0',
    tagline: 'Earn Your BBA While You Work',
    desc: 'A revolutionary work-based learning program in collaboration with IGNOU. Students earn a full BBA degree while gaining real-world business experience at partnered organizations.',
    features: ['IGNOU Recognized Degree', 'Work While You Study', 'Live Business Projects', 'Industry Mentorship', 'Flexible Schedule'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Enrolled Students', value: '8K+' }, { label: 'Partner Companies', value: '500+' }, { label: 'Completion Rate', value: '91%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'har-pariksha',
    name: 'HarPariksha',
    fullName: 'HKCL Online Examination Platform',
    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/har-pariksha.png',
    color: '#E8610A',
    tagline: 'Practice. Perfection. Success.',
    desc: 'A comprehensive online examination and assessment platform. HarPariksha enables secure, scalable, and fair examinations for thousands of students simultaneously with AI-powered proctoring.',
    features: ['AI Proctoring', 'Auto-grading', 'Live Monitoring', 'Result Analytics', 'Question Bank of 1L+'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Exams Conducted', value: '10K+' }, { label: 'Students Assessed', value: '20L+' }, { label: 'Accuracy Rate', value: '99.9%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1606326608606-aa0b62935f2b?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'digital-university',
    name: 'Digital University',
    fullName: 'HKCL Digital University Program',

    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/digital-university.png',
    color: '#0277BD',
    tagline: 'Empowering Higher Education Digitally',
    desc: 'A complete digital transformation suite for universities. From online admissions to digital exams, student ERP, and faculty management — everything a modern university needs to run digitally.',
    features: ['Student ERP', 'Online Admissions', 'Digital Exams', 'Faculty Portal', 'Analytics Dashboard'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Universities Onboarded', value: '28+' }, { label: 'Students Managed', value: '8L+' }, { label: 'Processes Automated', value: '150+' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1562774053-701939374585?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'auction-management',

    color: '#37474F',
    tagline: 'Transparent & Efficient Government Auctions',
    desc: 'A secure, transparent online auction platform for government assets. Ensures fair bidding processes with real-time monitoring, audit trails, and complete compliance with government procurement norms.',
    features: ['Real-time Bidding', 'Audit Trails', 'Secure Transactions', 'Multi-asset Support', 'Govt Compliance'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Auctions Conducted', value: '5000+' }, { label: 'Assets Auctioned', value: '₹500Cr+' }, { label: 'Transparent Bids', value: '100%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1560472354-b33ff0c44a43?w=800&q=80',
  },

    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/online-transfer.png',

    tagline: 'Hassle-Free Employee Transfer Management',
    desc: 'A government-grade employee transfer management system that digitizes the entire transfer process. Eliminates manual paperwork, reduces corruption, and ensures transparent, merit-based transfers.',
    features: ['Online Applications', 'Merit-based Processing', 'Anti-corruption Measures', 'Real-time Status', 'Multi-department Support'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Transfers Processed', value: '1L+' }, { label: 'Departments', value: '40+' }, { label: 'Time Saved', value: '80%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1454165804606-c3d57bc86b40?w=800&q=80',
  },

    id: 'online-admission',
    name: 'Online Admission',

    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/online-admission.png',

    tagline: 'Seamless Admissions for Modern Universities',
    desc: 'A complete online admission management system for colleges and universities. Handles applications, document verification, fee payment, seat allocation, and enrollment — all in one platform.',
    features: ['Online Applications', 'Document Upload & Verify', 'Online Fee Payment', 'Merit Lists', 'Seat Allocation Engine'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Colleges Using', value: '378+' }, { label: 'Students Admitted', value: '5L+ yearly' }, { label: 'Processing Time', value: '-70%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1606761568499-6d2451b23c66?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'online-recruitment',
    name: 'Online Recruitment',
    fullName: 'HKCL Online Recruitment Platform',
    category: 'HR Outsourcing',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/online-recruitment.png',
    color: '#BF360C',
    tagline: 'Changing The Future of Recruiting',
    desc: 'A feature-rich recruitment platform for government and private organizations. Enables end-to-end hiring — from job posting and application management to online testing and offer letters.',
    features: ['Job Posting Portal', 'Applicant Tracking', 'Online Testing', 'Background Verification', 'Analytics & Reports'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Jobs Posted', value: '50K+' }, { label: 'Applicants Managed', value: '20L+' }, { label: 'Hire Success Rate', value: '94%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1521737711867-e3b97375f902?w=800&q=80',
  },
  {
    id: 'web-software-dev',
    name: 'Web & Software Development',
    fullName: 'HKCL Web & Software Development',

    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/web-dev.png',
    color: '#1A237E',
    tagline: 'Custom Digital Solutions for Government & Enterprise',
    desc: 'End-to-end web and software development services. HKCL builds robust, scalable, and secure digital products for government departments, educational institutions, and enterprises.',
    features: ['Custom Web Apps', 'Mobile Applications', 'API Integrations', 'Cloud Infrastructure', 'Cybersecurity'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Projects Delivered', value: '500+' }, { label: 'Govt Clients', value: '50+' }, { label: 'Uptime SLA', value: '99.9%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1488590528505-98d2b5aba04b?w=800&q=80',
  },

    category: 'Courses & Assessment',
    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/smart-teacher.png',
    color: '#E65100',
    tagline: 'Empowering Educators for the Digital Age',
    desc: 'A comprehensive teacher training and certification program. Smart Teacher equips school and college educators with modern pedagogical tools, digital classroom management, and technology integration skills.',
    features: ['Digital Pedagogy', 'Smart Classroom Tools', 'Assessment Design', 'EdTech Integration', 'Certification'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Teachers Trained', value: '25K+' }, { label: 'Schools Covered', value: '3000+' }, { label: 'Satisfaction Score', value: '4.8/5' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580582932707-520aed937b7b?w=800&q=80',
  },

    logo: 'https://hkcl.in/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/campus-recruitment.png',
    color: '#6A1B9A',
    tagline: 'Bridging Campus to Corporate',
    desc: 'A structured campus placement and training program that prepares students for corporate interviews. Covers aptitude, communication, group discussions, and domain-specific training.',
    features: ['Aptitude Training', 'Communication Skills', 'Mock Interviews', 'GD Preparation', 'Domain Knowledge'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Students Placed', value: '50K+' }, { label: 'Recruiting Companies', value: '1000+' }, { label: 'Avg Package', value: '₹4.2L' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559523161-0fc0d8b814b5?w=800&q=80',

    features: ['Payroll Processing', 'Compliance Management', 'Employee Benefits', 'Performance Management', 'HR Analytics'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Organizations Served', value: '200+' }, { label: 'Employees Managed', value: '1L+' }, { label: 'Cost Reduction', value: '40%' }],
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1600880292203-757bb62b4baf?w=800&q=80',

  {

    desc: 'A state-wide talent identification and scholarship program for school students. HTS examines students across subjects and awards scholarships to the most meritorious students in Haryana.',
    features: ['State-wide Reach', 'Scholarship Awards', 'Merit-based Selection', 'Multiple Subjects', 'Govt Recognized'],
    stats: [{ label: 'Students Participated', value: '10L+' }, { label: 'Scholarships Awarded', value: '50K+' }, { label: 'Districts Covered', value: '22' }],

    stats: [{ label: 'Study Groups', value: '10K+' }, { label: 'Resources Shared', value: '5L+' }, { label: 'Active Learners', value: '3L+' }],

export const categories = ['All', 'Courses & Assessment', 'e-Governance', 'Higher Education', 'HR Outsourcing'];
